title: Auto Expo 2023: Suzuki Corp announces global unveil of first EV as eVX - ETAuto
summary: Maruti Suzuki India Limited unveiled the Concept Electric SUV eVX at the Auto Expo 2023, reinforcing its commitment to sustainable motoring with plans for hybrid and electric vehicles. The eVX features a 60 kWh battery offering up to 550 km range and is part of a broader strategy to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and promote environmental sustainability. Maruti Suzuki aims to invest significantly in electric vehicle production in India and has declared a commitment to exploring various eco-friendly technologies to support the government's objectives. The company's approach combines advanced design elements with an emphasis on aerodynamics to deliver a progressive, environmentally friendly SUV.
green_innovation: TRUE - The innovation involves the development of an electric SUV that aims to minimize environmental impact and reduce greenhouse gas emissions, aligning with sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE - The Concept eVX represents a new and improved product that significantly differs from the company's previous offerings, intended for market introduction.
green_product: TRUE - The Concept eVX is designed to significantly reduce environmental impact through its electric powertrain and sustainable design, qualifying it as a green product.
green_process: FALSE - While the article discusses the development of an EV, it does not specifically detail unique processes in manufacturing that emphasize minimized environmental impacts.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 336111 - Automobile Manufacturing, 336112 - Light Truck and Utility Vehicle Manufacturing, 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing, 484110 - General Freight Trucking, Local
greenwashing: FALSE - The article does not indicate misleading claims about the environmental benefits; the company is actively pursuing sustainable technologies and investments in electric vehicles.

title: How Recode's Shark Tank Rejection Boosted Its Growth ? - Indian Retailer
summary: The article discusses how various Direct-to-Consumer (D2C) brands in India are gearing up for the festive season by ramping up product offerings, enhancing supply chains, and leveraging technology to meet consumer demands. Brands like Solethreads, Zouk, IGP, and The Tribe Concepts are focusing on stylish, sustainable products and efficient operations to drive sales and improve customer experience. The festive season is accompanied by increasing focus on online sales and a shift toward eco-friendly practices in product design and fulfillment strategies.
green_innovation: TRUE, because the brands mentioned in the article emphasize sustainability in their product offerings and processes, particularly the focus on recycled materials, sustainable production methods, and efforts to minimize environmental impacts.
business_innovation: TRUE, because the article describes new or improved products and business processes introduced by D2C brands that significantly differ from their previous offerings.
green_product: TRUE, because products such as sustainable footwear and eco-friendly bags are designed to minimize environmental impacts, aligning with the definition of a green product.
green_process: TRUE, because the article mentions innovations in operation and production processes that prioritize sustainability and resource efficiency.

title: JK Tyre launches three off-the-road tyres at Bauma Conexpo 2023 - ETAuto
summary: JK Tyre launched three new off-the-road tyres at the Bauma Conexpo 2023, including the 26.5-25 Loader Champ and two variants for skid steer loaders. The company claims these products are technologically advanced and designed for challenging terrains, emphasizing performance and durability. The tyres are built with a silica-based tread compound for better wear resistance and feature a design that protects against damage.
green_innovation: FALSE, the article does not indicate that the tyres have significant environmental benefits or contribute to sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE, the launch of new tyre products that are improved versions of previous offerings signifies business innovation.
green_product: FALSE, while the tyres may perform well, the article does not provide evidence that they significantly reduce their environmental impact throughout their life cycle.
green_process: FALSE, there is no mention of the production methods used for these tyres that would qualify as environmentally sustainable.
product_or_process: 26.5-25 Loader Champ 28PR E4/L4 TL, 23X8.50-12 JET TRAX Ultima 6PR TL, 23X5.7-12 JET TRAX Super II 4PR TL

greenwashing: FALSE, the article does not suggest that JK Tyre is making misleading claims about the environmental benefits of their products.

title: SS Beauty to Bank on Aggressive Omnichannel Model, to reach 25 Doors by Next Fiscal: Biju Kassim, President ... - Indian Retailer
summary: The article discusses the significant growth and expansion of various beauty and personal care brands in India throughout 2022, highlighting their strategies, product innovations, and revenue goals for 2023. Brands such as SUGAR Cosmetics, The Body Shop, Plum, and others are adapting to changing consumer behavior, focusing on both retail and digital experiences to enhance customer engagement. Several brands are also committing to sustainability by increasing their vegan product lines and improving their environmental impact.
green_innovation: FALSE: While some brands mentioned aim for sustainability, the overall article does not focus primarily on innovations that significantly contribute to environmental sustainability goals.
business_innovation: TRUE: The article details several brands that have introduced new or improved products and expanded their operations significantly, showcasing a business innovation.
green_product: TRUE: Several products mentioned, particularly from The Body Shop, aim to be 100 percent Vegan and recyclable, thus fitting the definition of green products.
green_process: FALSE: The article does not provide specific details or processes that minimize environmental impacts or promote sustainability in their manufacturing or operational methods.

title: Rising production, EV transition, and global demand light up future of Indian tyre industry - ETAuto
